title.value: Sara Cox will be under pressure

value.title: | Drush Site-Install
value.description: This Red Nose Day, Radio 2 DJ, Sara Cox, has pledged to walk like an Egyptian straight to funkytown in an epic challenge that will see her boogie on down from her decks to the dancefloor and get physical for a hip-shaking 24 hours. On Monday 20th March, Sara won’t be too shy as she slips into legwarmers for her 80s themed Danceathon.

body.value:
This Red Nose Day, Radio 2 DJ, Sara Cox, has pledged to walk like an Egyptian straight to funkytown in an epic challenge that will see her boogie on down from her decks to the dancefloor and get physical for a hip-shaking 24 hours. On Monday 20th March, Sara won’t be too shy as she slips into legwarmers for her 80s themed Danceathon.

The challenge will see her push it, both physically and mentally, as she gets into the groove and attempts to throw 80s inspired shapes, non-stop, to raise cash for Comic Relief that will help change lives in the UK and across Africa. To ensure Sara feels the power of love and gets the support she needs, Radio 2 shows will be backing her all the way, showing a little respect by playing 80s music and checking in on her every step she takes.

Her celebrity pals will also jump in to keep her motivated throughout, when her muscles will no doubt ache like never before.
